name: C# Application
description: This project is a C# application whose purpose is to offer better medical services to patients, with a more organized patient records. It also regulates long queues for medical examinations, provides a more organized insight into the medical history of a patient. All of this combines to make a better medical system, with the main focus on organization, and user experience. Used  technologies: je C#.

name: Web Applicaton
description: We all know how annoying it can be to keep records of all of the students, their attendance, homework, and everything that makes one information system. This project makes it easier to manage records, it provides better insight on the students and their work during the academic year. Used technologies: je Html, CSS, javaScrpt, node.js.

name: ASP.NET
description: The system has a purpose to make shopping easier in the field of retail,wholesale, while also shipping products and keeping track on articles in storage. It also provides auto-mechanic services. Used  technologies: je C#, Html, CSS i ASP.NET.

name: Blender
description: For the game which we developed in Unity, every member of the team had to design a room which was later used as one of the rooms in the game. For a realistic look we used Blender to design the rooms
